markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Additional Recollection](/Feats.aspx?ID=4877) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
You succeed or critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge on your hunted prey

</column>

---

You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face. You immediately attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a different creature you can perceive.
name: Additional Recollection
